_header: My king the water greet / and the blood he sweat
Note: For another text see 1813; includes the quatrain, 6540.5; also in this treatise is 3651.
Subjects: Passion, meditations of; Christ, passion of
Bibliographic Ghosts: Paris, Bibliothèque Mazarine 514 ; Cambridge UK, Magdalene College Pepys 2125, f. 99v: this copy of Ego Dormio substitutes 1813; London, British Library Egerton 3245 [olim Gurney]: not in this MS
_description: ‘Meditacio de passione’ in the treatise, Ego dormio — 41 rhyming lines in various stanzaic patterns
